snippet: All five victims in the Tulsa, Okla. shootings were African-Americans. Witnesses said the shooter was a white man in a pickup truck.
abstract: Authorities in Tulsa, Okla, scramble to find a man who they say opened fire on five people in four apparently random shootings, killing three people wounding two others.

byline.original: By CHANNING JOSEPH and MATT FLEGENHEIMER

lead_paragraph: All five victims in the Tulsa, Okla. shootings were African-Americans. Witnesses said the shooter was a white man in a pickup truck.

headline.seo: Police Seek Suspect in Tulsa Shootings
headline.main: Police Suspect Single Gunman in Attacks in Oklahoma
headline.print_headline: Police Suspect Single Gunman in Attacks in Oklahoma
